articles.author: Indo-Asian News Service
articles.title: Were Nepal Robbed Off A Famous Win Over South Africa In T20 World Cup? Internet Thinks So | Cricket News - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Fans were quick to spot a huge umpiring blunder after Nepal lost by a solitary run against South Africa.
articles.content: Heinrich Klassen's decisive run-out on the final delivery secured a nail-biting one-run victory for South Africa against Nepal, ending the Asian side's hopes of advancing to the Super Eight stage in … [+3418 chars]
